channel.title: Jaewon Seo | Computer System Architecture Lab

item.title: HyMM: A Hybrid Sparse-Dense Matrix Multiplication Accelerator for GCNs
One paper accepted to DATE 2025
item.description: One papers was accepted to the Design, Automation and Test in Europe Conference (DATE) 2025. Our paper proposes HyMM, an efficient sparse-dense matrix multiplication accelerator architecture for GCNs. HyMM implements a hybrid sparse-dense matrix multiplication dataflow to exploit the data locality observed in graph structures in GCNs.

item.title: Jaewon presented at NVMSA 2024
item.description: Jaewon presented his research work regarding an efficient garbage collection scheme for remap-based SSDs at the 13th IEEE Non-Volatile Memory Systems and Applications (NVMSA 2024). Good job, Jaewon!

item.title: Coldmap: Extending SSD Lifetime Exploiting Multi-Page Mapping Information
Yewon and Jaewon defended
item.description: Yewon and Jaewon successfully defended their Master’s theses. Congratulations!!

item.title: One paper accepted to NVMSA 2024
item.description: One paper was accepted to the the 13th IEEE Non-Volatile Memory Systems and Applications Symposium (NVMSA). Our research work proposes an effieicnt garbage collection mechanism, called ColdMap, which can extend the lifetime of SSD by exploiting multi-page mapping information.

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2024
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2024 (CSC 2024) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2024.

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2023
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2023 (CSC 2023) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Jonghyun and Boyoung presented their research work during the Student Poster Session. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2023.

item.title: Jonghyun, Inje, and Jaewon attended a training program in Germany
item.description: Jonghyun, Inje, and Jaewon attended an oversea training program supported by the Convergence Security Core Talent Training Program. They visited VDE and BOSCH Cybercompare to present internship proposals regarding computer security policies and solutions.

item.title: Jaewon and Yewon have joined CSArch Lab
item.description: Jaewon and Yewon have joined CSArch Lab since the Fall semester 2022. We hope they will enjoy adventures in computer architecture research. Welcome!!
